text: this video assumes you already know the
following items displayed on your
screen if you're not ready to watch here
are some places you can learn more
welcome in this video we will show how
kosere analyst and Amazon elastic map
produce together provide an intuitive
High productivity solution for working
with large structured and unstructured
data sets using Apache Hado you will
learn how to use kosere analyst with
Amazon EMR to access assemble and
analyze data of any size and type and
then act on the results kosere analyst
works on Windows Mac and Linux desktop
systems it provides a comprehensive
workspace for analyzing large amounts of
unstructured and structured data stored
on Amazon S3 using EMR it is based on
and incorporates Apache Hive and is
compatible with Hive on EMR the big data
analytics workflow is divided into four
stages access assemble analyze and act
the access view enables configuration of
Amazon account credentials and access to
EMR job Flows In S3 first we enter our
AWS account credentials clicking on the
test button verifies the account we now
have access to job flows already running
and are able to launch one or more new
job flows easily from the list of
connections we can choose the job flow
to use and simply start the connection
once the job flow connection is started
we can move to accessing and preparing
our data in the assemble phase
here you can point to the data you want
to use whether it's on S3 your local or
a networked file system in this example
we're selecting a log file in an S3
bucket the product automatically detects
many popular data and compression
formats and makes it easy to set up
familiar tables for subsequent
analysis Discovery exploration and the
creation of actionable results is the
focus of the analyze view Big Data
analysis is a process of exploration and
it refinement from an initial starting
point in the analyze View using familiar
SQL and formatting filtering and sorting
assistance we can initiate full or
sample queries that run on the EMR job
flow and create results which we can
view format filter and
Acton here we have generated an initial
result set which we can filter
automatically and generate a refined set
of results visualizing results helps
with further analysis and in Sharing
reports with others
here we can use the integrated charting
wizard to create a pie
chart other actions we can perform on
the SQL result sets and charts include
the ability to save and reuse the
queries export result sets in CSV tsv
and Excel formats locally or on S3 we
can also save results to a database data
warehouse or Apache Hive table and
automatically launch Microsoft Excel
Tableau or other bi tools to use with
our result set
in summary you have learned how to use
kosere analyst with Amazon elastic map
produce to perform big data analytics on
any size or type of data stored on
Amazon
S3 in addition to standard licensing
kosere analyst is available under the
same pay as you go hourly pricing model
as EMR providing a low cost of Entry to
Big Data analysis and a single payment
process from Amazon for more information
please visit our website or contact us
with questions by email thank you for
watching
